content:
when given a prompt/statement/utterance assign the correct intent(s). use the intents and definitions listed below:

UpdateEvent: a user requests to update information such as title or location of an existing event

AddEvent: a user requests to add a new event to their calendar

RemoveEvent: a user requests to remove an existing event from their calendar

ModifyEvent: a user requests to modify the date or time of an existing event

ChangeEventAttendance: a user requests to change their RSVP to an existing event

Assign multiple intents if applicable and provide an explanation for each when doing so. Please output as a json as a dictionary under a key "booking_response" with value of output being dictionaries with the key being the matched intent(s) and  the values as a subdictionary with the keys as follows: explanation and a list of associated entities (assign the slots as you see fit) with their corresponding value extracted.

statement:
book vacation time for next tuesday to friday starting at 9am and ending at 5pm. mark my calendar as out of office and remove my attendance for any work events
